text:
New York, NY - Full Time - J.Crew - Java Web Application Developer / Front End Engineers

Are you looking to work on something new? Want to be part of an exciting project that is currently underway? Than the opportunity at J.Crew might be the one for you. Please feel free to reach out to me at Jason.Chen@jcrew.com if you are interested..
